title: Henrik Larsson and Southend - why legends of the game are suddenly interested in EFL clubs
text:
These are strange times indeed when an insight into the possible future of Southend United is provided during a press conference with the Holland manager in Rotterdam.

The question to Ronald Koeman last week did not concern Southend directly but, just a few days down the line, his answer is certainly relevant to any of the club’s fans who have found themselves taken aback by the prospect of Henrik Larsson becoming their new manager.

According to Koeman, Larsson is part of a group of former players who “have the dream” of taking over a football club. Koeman was an adviser to the group, which included Dennis Bergkamp and Dirk Kuyt, who attempted to buy Wycombe Wanderers this year.

The consortium...
